api_management_name.description: The name of the API Management Service in which the User should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group in which the API Management Service exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

email.description: The email address associated with this user.

first_name.description: The first name for this user.

last_name.description: The last name for this user.

user_id.description: The Identifier for this User, which must be unique within the API Management Service. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

confirmation.description: The kind of confirmation email which will be sent to this user. Possible values are `invite` and `signup`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

password.description: The password associated with this user.

state.description: The state of this user. Possible values are `active`, `blocked` and `pending`.
state.notes: the State can be changed from Pending -> Active/Blocked but not from Active/Blocked -> Pending.

id.description: The ID of the API Management User.

create.description: Used when creating the API Management User.

update.description: Used when updating the API Management User.

read.description: Used when retrieving the API Management User.

delete.description: Used when deleting the API Management User.
